welcome_message_body: "Welcome to New Richmond, a charming city known for its picturesque beauty and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our charming streets, indulge in our delicious cuisine, and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal is primarily used for domestic flights and offers a comfortable and convenient travel experience.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal caters to international flights and offers a range of services for international travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, shopping, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying in on private jets, the private terminal at Downtown Airport offers luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a network name of 'Downtown Airport WiFi'.
